Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that has both water and light to show it living and growing.
The student can draw a plant without water to show it not living and growing.
The student can draw a plant without light to show it not living and growing.
The student can include observations to show how water affects plant growth.
The student can include observations to show how light affects plant growth.
The student can identify and illustrate the differences between plants with adequate resources and those without.
